text: Patricia Aznar (born 19 February 1975) is a Spanish former professional tennis player. Aznar won eight ITF titles during her career, all in doubles, which included a $50,000 tournament in Barcelona in 1995. She made her only WTA Tour main draw appearance at the 1996 Madrid Open, partnering Eva Bes in the doubles. ==ITF finals== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%;" width=15% |- bgcolor="#ADDFAD" | $50,000 tournaments |- bgcolor="lightblue" | $25,000 tournaments |- bgcolor="#f0f8ff" | $10,000 tournaments |} ===Singles: 4 (0–4)=== {|class="sortable wikitable" style=font-size:97% |- !
